game.name: DCS: AV-8B Hormuz Freedom Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: A fictional story-based campaign that will test your skill in using the AV-8B Harrier in a variety of missions while you operate with the VMA-513 “The Flying Nightmares”, on board LHA-1 Tarawa as part of a carrier group.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fictional story-based campaign that will test your skill in using the AV-8B Harrier in a variety of missions while you operate with the VMA-513 “The Flying Nightmares”, on board LHA-1 Tarawa as part of a carrier group.
